narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Newport News at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.570049+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to return home.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 11 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along US-58. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Newport News, Virginia.

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Newport News at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.570049+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to return home. Within 11 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along US-58. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Newport News, Virginia. Around 3 hours later, a parent reported someone matching the description (6-year-old female, wearing navy sweatshirt with white logo, blue jeans, red Crocs) near Clarke.
